metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2524 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The _rl_tropen function in util.c in GNU readline before 6.3 patch 3 allows local users to create or overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a /var/tmp/rltrace.[PID] file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the security issue is in a debugging function that isn't used, we will not be publishing an update for this issue.

criterions.comment: readline6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
